channel.title: Suggested buff for Knight
channel.description:
The knights Sacrifice ability is a pretty good abil for later in the game. In the early days though it really sucks to die.
My suggestion is to change the ability to this.
If the target you guard is attacked within the first 3 days, you will kill the attacker, but it wont kill you.
After those 3 days, back to norm. You kill them, and they will kill you.

item.title: Suggested buff for Knight
item.dc:creator: Vandalay
item.description:
IMO, maybe a bit of a compromise. I do agree that early game, a 1:1 trade against say unseen or cult, is actually a double whammy.

Knight kills assasain, knight and assasain die, MM gets a new conversion N3, random cult becomes assasin, some other BD becomes the new converted, Cults just as well off as they were before.

That being said, I’d also say killing a cult, assasin for no cost, is also too strong. Maybe a better starting point, for the first 2-3 days, knight negates attacks. He neither auto dies, nor kills the attacker.
